# authentik_stage_captcha (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a captcha stage

resource "authentik_stage_captcha" "name" {
  name        = "captcha"
  private_key = "foo"
  public_key  = "bar"
}
```

- `private_key` (String, Sensitive)
